column3: str

A great threat to the peace here in the Shroud has made itself known, and I have been sent to help drive it out. Adventurer or no, I will not suffer anyone interfering with my work. Now please, move along.
We were fortunate the curator of that damnable place was careless enough to leave his notes where we might find them. Perhaps now we can discover his true motives.
